title: Fatal horizon, driven by acidification, closes in on marine organisms in Southern Ocean

title_detail.value: Fatal horizon, driven by acidification, closes in on marine organisms in Southern Ocean

summary: Marine microorganisms in the Southern Ocean may find themselves in a deadly vise grip by century's end as ocean acidification creates a shallower horizon for life.

summary_detail.value: Marine microorganisms in the Southern Ocean may find themselves in a deadly vise grip by century's end as ocean acidification creates a shallower horizon for life.
